title: Fame And Secrets
description: A gritty and heart-pounding enemies-to-lovers/opposites attract rock star romantic suspense.Obsession has a new facePhoebeWhen I fell for a rock star, I knew my life would change.That’s not the problem.While my fiancé lives it up on tour, I’m lost in a nightmare.All unpaid debts eventually come due.And a sin from my past has returned to collect.It’s time to stop running and face what I left behind.He started this, but I’ll end it.Julian Phoebe wants to keep me in the dark, but I know more than she does.That’s the problem.My desperate need to protect the woman I love is driving her away.When the unthinkable happens, everything unravels…Including me.But when the devil comes knocking, all bets are off.Obsession works both ways.*Fame and Secrets is book 2 of two interconnected standalones featuring the same couple. This book completes Julian and Phoebe's story.
author: Cora Kenborn
